kpi.name: LTE_691a

kpi_info.title: Nr Rcv VLAN Intf PHB_Class_2 PKTS
kpi_info.use: The number of packets that were successfully received within the Assured Forwarding 2 PHB class. The KPI is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: Nr Rcv VLAN Intf PHB_Class_2 PKTS
